caption.p: ( A) Distribution of sizes (log10 scale) of the 270 transmission clusters found in the CV (2004–2014) through phylogenetic analysis. Block letters indicate the 12 clusters that were analysed with BEAST. ( B) Total number of patients for each risk group included in transmission clusters (n = 1039). ( C) Number of transmission clusters depending on the risk group in which they were classified. *>1/4 patients shared a known risk group, but they were not enough to classify the cluster.
